mapper.select: select A.theater_no, A.theater_name, B.location_no, B.location_name from MGV_THEATERS A, MGV_LOCATION B where A.location_no = B.location_no order by B.location_no asc;

select A.THEATER_NO, A.THEATER_NAME, A.THEATER_ADDRESS, A.THEATER_TEL, A.THEATER_DISABLED, A.THEATER_INFO, A.location_no, B.location_name, C.PARKING_INFO, C.PARKING_CONFIRM, C.PARKING_CASH from MGV_THEATERS A, MGV_LOCATION B, MGV_THEATER_PARKING_INFO C where A.THEATER_NO = #{value} AND A.THEATER_NO = C.THEATER_NO and A.location_no = B.location_no

select E.FACILITY_TYPE as type, E.FACILITY_NAME as name, E.FACILITY_ICON as icon from MGV_THEATER_FACILITY_INFO D, MGV_THEATER_FACILITY_TYPE E where D.theater_no = #{value} AND D.FACILITY_TYPE = E.FACILITY_TYPE
select FLOOR, INFO from MGV_THEATER_FLOORS_INFO where theater_no = #{value}
select theater_no as no, theater_name as name from MGV_THEATERS where location_no = #{value}
select screen_id as id, screen_name as name from MGV_THEATER_SCREEN where theater_no = #{value}
select screen_id as id, screen_name as name, screen_seats as seats from MGV_THEATER_SCREEN where screen_id = #{value}
select facility_type as type, facility_name as name, facility_icon as icon from MGV_THEATER_FACILITY_TYPE
mapper.update: update MGV_THEATERS set theater_name = #{name}, theater_address = #{address}, theater_tel = #{tel}, theater_info = #{info} where theater_no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into MGV_THEATERS (location_no, theater_name, theater_address, theater_tel, theater_info) values (#{location.no},#{name},#{address},#{tel},#{info})
insert into MGV_THEATER_FLOORS_INFO (theater_no, floor, info) values (#{theaterNo}, #{floor}, #{info})
insert into MGV_THEATER_PARKING_INFO (theater_no, parking_info, parking_confirm, parking_cash) values (#{theaterNo}, #{info}, #{confirm}, #{cash})
